replies.body: Interestingly, people have a harder time finding supports in lower elo, where there's more players. How's that?

> [{quoted}](name=If Ahri Was Real,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=WGRfVe1O,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-20T00:44:03.202+0000)
>
> Interestingly, people have a harder time finding supports in lower elo, where there's more players. How's that?

Because nobody in low elo wants to support, lol.

> [{quoted}](name=Coriandr,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=WGRfVe1O,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2015-11-20T01:47:07.015+0000)
>
> Because nobody in low elo wants to support, lol.

Or mid ELO, or high ELO, or unranked, or in ARAM, or on Dominion, lol.
I'd say 50% of the high elo community mains Thresh. The other 50% mains Vayne.

> [{quoted}](name=Poundman,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=WGRfVe1O,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2015-11-20T01:53:21.249+0000)
>
> Or mid ELO, or high ELO, or unranked, or in ARAM, or on Dominion, lol.

Exactly.
I'd assume I'm low elo, and support is always my preference.

> [{quoted}](name=If Ahri Was Real,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=WGRfVe1O,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-20T00:44:03.202+0000)
>
> Interestingly, people have a harder time finding supports in lower elo, where there's more players. How's that?

because all of the 7 year olds want to do all of the damage and 1v5 the enemy team

never works out for them, they just feed

> [{quoted}](name=If Ahri Was Real,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=WGRfVe1O,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-20T00:44:03.202+0000)
>
> Interestingly, people have a harder time finding supports in lower elo, where there's more players. How's that?

Dunno, first time trying the mode. After 15 min I quit lol.
Maybe YOU weren't lucky enough to get my great Crank skills, m8.

To my knowledge, Supports, Junglers, and ADC's are the most sought after for the most part. It's actually kind of funny finding lobbies as support. Since you have plenty of other options than the one you were matched into, you can easily pick and choose which lobby you join for a better team comp. I should know, I do this quite a bit.
